mapper.sql: id, menu_name, parent_id, order_num, icon, url, menu_type, visible, perms, create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, remark
mapper.select: select distinct m.id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name, m.url, m.visible, ifnull(m.perms,'') as perms, m.menu_type, m.order_num, m.icon,m.create_by, m.create_time, m.update_by, m.update_time, m.remark from sys_menu m where m.menu_type in ('M', 'C') and m.visible = 'Y' order by m.parent_id, m.order_num

select distinct m.id, m.parent_id, m.menu_name, m.url, m.visible, ifnull(m.perms,'') as perms, m.menu_type, m.order_num, m.icon, m.create_by, m.create_time, m.update_by, m.update_time, m.remark from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on m.id = rm.menu_id left join sys_user_role ur on rm.role_id = ur.role_id left join sys_role ro on ur.role_id = ro.id where ur.user_id = #{userId} and m.menu_type in ('M', 'C') and m.visible = 'Y' order by m.parent_id, m.order_num

select m.id, m.menu_name, m.parent_id, m.order_num, m.icon, m.url, m.menu_type, m.visible, m.perms, m.create_by, m.create_time, m.update_by, m.update_time, m.remark ,p.menu_name as parentName from sys_menu m left join sys_menu p on m.parent_id = p.id where m.id = #{id}
select m.id as menu_id,m.menu_name, m.icon, m.perms from sys_menu m left join sys_role_menu rm on m.id = rm.menu_id where m.visible = 'Y' and m.perms <> '' and rm.role_id = #{roleId}
